data.name: Necore Tower - Redux Edition Demo
data.detailed_description:
notice

This is a (VERY EARLY ALPHA) demo of Necore Tower - Redux Edition. As the product is still currently in development, this is the public beta access and is not a full representation of the final product. This set of builds will be updated regularly until release.

26-08-2021 V.E.A 0.6.0a : You can Complete quests in the demo up until "Is It Viral?". See the main menu for more information.

Upon completion of development, this will be a demo of the final product.

about the Game

Necore Tower brings the modern and refined ARPG concepts and elements together with the nostalgia of the old and the original. Necore Tower is a top down, heavily story driven, Dark Fantasy, action role playing game, designed to bring you into the world of Necore before the release of the first full title "Necore: The Thunder King", which takes the elements of Necore Tower and greatly extends upon them.

Climb through floors once bustling with religious pilgrims and passer-by vagabonds, purge the darkness from the tower as you ascend and discover our hero's fate at the tower's spire. That is, if you can make it that far.

Necore Tower is an experience that is geared towards story over gameplay. Discover the full story by adventuring off the beaten path in each floor.

wishlist the Final Product Here

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1516340/Necore_Tower__Redux_Edition/

data.short_description: Climb through floors once bustling with religious pilgrims and passer-by vagabonds, purge the darkness from the tower as you ascend and discover our hero's fate at the tower's spire. Play the Demo of Necore Tower - Redux Edition for free and experience the game before and after it is released!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core Processor @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IntelÂ® HD Graphics 2500/4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel HD Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Quad Core Processor @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel HD Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Known To Work On Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS
  • Processor: Quad core Processor @2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: X11, OpenGL, Video Memory 2GB+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Memory is related to your machine build, not the required amount for the game.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Known To Work On Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: X11, OpenGL, Video Memory 2GB+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Memory is related to your machine build, not the required amount for the game.

data.legal_notice: Necore Tower and the Necore Series is owned solely by Outback Games (Lochlan Kennedy), All Rights Reserved (c) 2017-2021.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains:
Dark themes (including, and not limited to death)
Fantasy/cartoon violence
Subtle crude humour and
Player mockery
